__e: You know she got one of her lover-boys to come over here and kill him.
- Do you think it was one of her lovers?
We are death's lovers and only us because both suffering and fear of her must stay away from our people.
"years, lovers and glasses or wine... these are things that are never kind".
They're lovers. And I know why you don't want to believe it.
You knew that we were lovers before and you didn't tell me?
